title: Facebook’s Meta-morphosis
description:
From the company that brought you alternate facts comes an alternate reality! 
This episode of Today, Explained was produced by Will Reid, engineered by Efim Shapiro, edited by Matt Collette, fact-checked by Laura Bullard, and was hosted by Sean Rameswaram.

itunes:title: Facebook’s Meta-morphosis
itunes:author: Recode
itunes:subtitle: The company’s rebrand comes amid a week of bad news.
